member.summary: Inform user that any occupant is allowed to see the user's full JID

member.summary: Inform user that his or her affiliation changed while not in the room

member.summary: Inform occupants that room now shows unavailable members

member.summary: Inform occupants that room now does not show unavailable members

member.summary: Inform occupants that a non-privacy-related room configuration change has occurred

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.MUC.MucStatus.OwnPresence
member.summary: Inform user that presence refers to one of its own room occupants

member.summary: Inform occupants that room logging is now enabled

member.summary: Inform occupants that room logging is now disabled

member.summary: Inform occupants that the room is now non-anonymous

member.summary: Inform occupants that the room is now semi-anonymous

member.summary: Inform occupants that the room is now fully-anonymous

member.summary: Inform user that a new room has been created

member.summary: Inform user that the service has assigned or modified the occupant's roomnick

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.MUC.MucStatus.Banned
member.summary: Inform user that he or she has been banned from the room

member.summary: Inform all occupants of new room nickname

member.summary: Inform user that he or she has been kicked from the room

member.summary: Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because of an affiliation change

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.MUC.MucStatus.RemovedDueToNonMembership
member.summary: Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because the room has been changed to members-only and the user is not a member

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.XMPP.MUC.MucStatus.RemovedDueToSystemShutdown
member.summary: Inform user that he or she is being removed from the room because of a system shutdown

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.XMPP.MUC.MultiUserChatClient.SendGroupChatMessage(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary:
Sends a simple group chat message to a chat room.
Note: The client must be an occupant of the chat room before messages can be properly propagated to other occupants of the room.
